price: Wọn yó sì máa gba ife ọtí mu láààrin ara wọn nínú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra. Kò sí ọ̀rọ̀ ìsọkúsọ àti ìwà ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ nínú Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra.
arabic: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: yatanāzaʿūna fīhā kasan lā laghwun fīhā walā tathīmun
translations: They will pass to one another
